page.title: 18May Day Spectacular
page.content: The May Day Spectacular was held on 6th may in the grounds of Caldicot Castle. It was organised by members of Chepstow Round Table. The proceeds went to local charities. At the fair there were things like 'the Cage', helter skelter, dodgem cars and an unusual ride called the American Scambler. There were many side shows such as dart throwing and rifle shooting. In the central arena there were stuntmen on motor cycles and there was also an aerobatic display team. For Â£7.00 you could have a ride in a helicopter. There were many stalls manned by local organisations and throughout the day the Severn Tunnel Band played a medley of tunes.
